Pf::IsRunning ( $  proc = ''  ) 

Checks if the process(es) is running.

Uses ps with grep.

Parameters:
[in] $proc string Module process name
Returns:
boolean TRUE if there is any process running

Todo:
Should use pid files instead of ps, if possible at all

Pf::InstallNewCrontab ( $  contents  ) 

Installs given crontab contents.

Crontab contents should be installed by running crontab, otherwise they are not activated just by directly editing crontab files.

)
